module.description: Backend module to generate code for
module.x-prompt: Please enter name of the backend module you wish to generate proxies for. (default: "app")

source.description: Angular project to resolve root namespace & API definition URL from
source.x-prompt: Plese enter Angular project name to resolve root namespace & API definition URL from. (default: workspace "defaultProject")

target.description: Angular project to generate code in
target.x-prompt: Plese enter Angular project name to place generated code in. (default: workspace "defaultProject")
